name: ZomWick
description:
Important Note From Developers

We will update and maintain this game as long as we can without any paid DLC content or in game purchases. For more info or to give feedback please join our discord.







Welcome to Zomwick, an innovative tower defense game that challenges players to survive enemy hordes without the use of traditional resources or violence. In Zomwick, strategic planning and quick reflexes are key to setting up towers that interact with terrain and other elements to slow down enemies and buy precious time.

・STOP ZOMWICK , DELAY HIM AS LONG AS YOU CAN



As you progress through increasingly difficult challenges, you must think outside the box and come up with conciliatory tactics to stay alive. With endless replayability thanks to unique, non-repeating levels, Zomwick offers a thrilling and engaging experience.

・MOVE YOUR TOWERS AS YOU WISH, GUIDE ZOMWICK




With beautiful graphics, an atmospheric soundtrack, and intuitive controls, it's easy to lose yourself in Zomwick for hours on end. If you're seeking a fresh and exciting take on the tower defense genre, or simply want to test your wits and resourcefulness against a relentless zombie horde, look no further than Zomwick.


Features:

  • A unique approach to tower defense gameplay that avoids traditional currency and violence.
  • Unique AI behavior for enemies that will surprise and challenge you.
  • Fictile upgrades and abilities that can shape every gameplay run.
  • Engaging levels that require strategic decision-making and present a challenge to players.
  • Beautifully designed environments with stunning graphics and attention to detail.
  • A variety of towers and upgrades to choose from, each with unique strengths and weaknesses.
  • Charming characters, including the titular anti-hero Zomwick and his quirky companions.
  • An immersive soundtrack that enhances the overall experience.
  • Steam achievements.
  • Various enemy types that require different strategies to defeat.
  • Diverse terrain types that affect enemy behavior in different ways.
  • Regular updates and new content to keep the game fresh and exciting.
